name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S: Jougai Rantou!? Shuyaku Soudatsusen
overview: The Sailor Senshi are fighting to choose a new leader. After defeating an enemy, Sailor Moon was teased by Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Mars, who called her undependable. The rest of the Sailor Senshi then decided to have a contest to choose a new leader. Every Sailor Senshi, besides Sailor Saturn, is available as a playable character in the versus mode. Sailor Uranus, Sailor Pluto and Sailor Neptune are not available in the single-player story mode, though they do show up as opponents. The player, as their chosen character, simply has to defeat the other eight characters to win.
